00072         //void setToolWidget(KviIrcViewToolWidget * w){ m_pToolWidget = w; };
00073         void setOn(bool b){setCheckState(0,b?Qt::Checked:Qt::Unchecked);};
00074         bool isOn(){
00075                 if (checkState(0)==Qt::Checked) return true;
00076                 else return false;
00077         }
00078 };
